title: TobyMac's "Life After Death" / Taylor Hicks Performs Live | Daily Best of August 25 | Rick & Bubba
description:
TobyMac joins us and opens up about writing songs after the death of his son and his latest release "Life After Death." American Idol alum Taylor Hicks performs live in the studio. In politics, Joe Biden makes moves to forgive $10K of student loans. This is a slap in the face to the working class that pays their debts. Bubba is still out due his gallbladder surgery, but we make an incredible discovery about the potential origin of Bubba's gallbladder woes. And lastly, an old lady fights off a fox attack.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
